#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
 
int main()
{
	int testcases,flag,two,five;
	unsigned long long num,unit;
	char c;
	
	std::cin>>testcases;
	for(int j=0;j<testcases;j++)
	{
		unit=1;
		two=five=0;
		do
		{
			std::cin>>num;
			if(num==0)
			{
				unit=0;
				break;
			}
			while(num%2==0)
			{
				num/=2;
				two++;
			}
			while(num%5==0)
			{
				num/=5;
				five++;
			}
			unit=(unit*num)%10;
		}while((c=getchar())!='\n');
		if(five>two)
			unit=5;
		else if(two>five)
			unit=(unit*2*(two-five))%10;
			
		if(unit)
			std::cout<<unit<<std::endl;
		else
			std::cout<<"Robot hanged.\n"; 
	}
	return 0;
}
